ModMetaData.name: Android tiers HellDrone-Extension
ModMetaData.author: Atlas
ModMetaData.description:
Content made by Helldrone/me and was put together by Atlas, without him this would not be possible.
THIS MOD IS SUBJECT TO CHANGE.
Adds Several items into the game as requested by donator Helldrone
- Robotic Plasma Claw.
- Robotic Power claw.
- Robo Fennec.
- Overcharged Luci pumpx
- 4 New Research items
- Hell Unit Android
[Requires Android Tiers to be loaded before this]
- https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1386412863
There may be some details that's slurred or got grammar issues, they will be fixed with time unless aided by comments!
Credits to Atlas for making this real.
